verses.kjv: And in that day thou shalt say, O LORD, I will praise thee: though thou wast angry with me, thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.
verses.web: In that day you will say, “I will give thanks to you, LORD; for though you were angry with me, your anger has turned away and you comfort me.
verses.ct: On that day you will say, "LORD, I will praise you! Though you were angry with me, your anger has faded, and now you comfort me."

verses.kjv: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
verses.web: Behold, God is my salvation. I will trust, and will not be afraid; for Yah, LORD, is my strength and song; and he has become my salvation.”
verses.ct: "Look — God is my salvation! I will trust him and not be afraid, because the LORD God is my strength and my song. He himself has become my salvation."

verses.kjv: Therefore with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.
verses.web: Therefore with joy you will draw water out of the wells of salvation.
verses.ct: With joy you will draw water from the wells of salvation.

verses.kjv: And in that day shall ye say, Praise the LORD, call upon his name, declare his doings among the people, make mention that his name is exalted.
verses.web: In that day you will say, “Give thanks to LORD! Call on his name. Declare his doings among the peoples. Proclaim that his name is exalted!
verses.ct: On that day you will say, "Praise the LORD! Call on his name! Tell the nations what he has done, and declare that his name is exalted!"

verses.kjv: Sing unto the LORD; for he hath done excellent things: this is known in all the earth.
verses.web: Sing to LORD, for he has done excellent things! Let this be known in all the earth!
verses.ct: "Sing to the LORD, because he has done magnificent things — let the whole earth know about it!"

verses.kjv: Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion: for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
verses.web: Cry aloud and shout, you inhabitant of Zion; for the Holy One of Israel is great among you!”
verses.ct: "Shout for joy, people of Zion, because the Holy One of Israel is great and lives among you!"
